00025 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00026 // session checking
00027 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00029 
00030 // get ID of loan session
00031 $loanSessionID = trim(strip_tags($_POST['loanSessionID']));
00032 if (isset($_POST['newLoanDate']) && trim($_POST['newLoanDate']) != '') {
00033     $newLoanDate = trim($_POST['newLoanDate']);
00034     $newDates = array('newDate' => $newLoanDate);
00035     $_SESSION['temp_loan'][$loanSessionID]['loan_date'] = $newLoanDate;
00036 }
00037 if (isset($_POST['newDueDate']) && trim($_POST['newDueDate']) != '') {
00038     $newDueDate = trim($_POST['newDueDate']);
00039     $newDates = array('newDate' => $newDueDate);
00040     $_SESSION['temp_loan'][$loanSessionID]['due_date'] = $newDueDate;
00041 }
00042 // parse to json
00043 echo json_encode($newDates);
00044 ?>
